r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Target a specific PHP version during install by setting `DD_TRACE_PHP_BIN` #604 - Curl Integration: Add all available information from `curl_getinfo()` as span tags #642
### Changed - Move dogstatsd client init to rinit #703
### Fixed - Issues related to limited tracing #689 - Backup and restore last error (related to `error_get_last()` issue) #694 - Handle out-of-sync spans #702 - Sandbox tracer flushing #707 - Enhance OpenTracing StartSpanOptions support #708 - Ensure errors raised in request init hook do not affect `error_get_last()` #709
